Title: Kixi-Taka, the Diviner
Legend: Though only a lowly priest in the complex rungs of the skink hierarchy, Kixi-Taka is looked upon with favour by his slann masters. Entrusted with several relics of Old One technology, he faithfully leads the Starblood Stalkers, utterly committed to the Great Plan.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Single, Unique. Kixi-Taka the Diviner, Klaq-Trok and The Starblood Stalkers must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: Kixi-Taka, the Diviner, is armed with a Starbolt and Star-stone Staff.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Shadowstrike Starhost • Shadowstrike Temple-host

Rules.Name: Servant Of The Starmasters
Rules.Fluff: Tasked with a mission of vital importance, Kixi-Taka bears all manner of esoteric devices that he uses to shape reality in accordance with the Great Plan.
Rules.Rule: Servant of the Starmasters: Once per battle, in your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 6" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, models in that unit cannot contest objectives until the start of the next turn.
